res/layout/card_arearank.xml

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>

<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    android:orientation="horizontal" android:layout_width="fill_parent"
    android:layout_height="wrap_content">

    <TextView
        android:layout_width="0dp"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:textAppearance="@android:style/TextAppearance.Holo.Medium"
        android:text="AreaRank for Lewisham 010"
        android:id="@+id/card_arearank_text"
        android:layout_weight="1"
        android:layout_gravity="center_vertical"
        android:paddingLeft="16dp"
        android:fontFamily="sans-serif-thin"
        android:textSize="24sp" />

    <TextView
        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
        android:layout_height="64dp"
        android:text="100.0"
        android:id="@+id/card_arearank_score"
        android:layout_gravity="center_vertical|right"
        android:gravity="center"
        android:textAlignment="gravity"
        android:singleLine="true"
        android:textColor="@android:color/primary_text_dark"
        android:background="@android:color/holo_blue_dark"
        android:padding="4dp"
        android:textAppearance="@android:style/TextAppearance.Holo.Large" />
</LinearLayout>

res/layout/card_error.xml

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="match_parent"
    android:orientation="horizontal"
    android:layout_marginRight="@dimen/activity_horizontal_margin"
    android:layout_marginLeft="@dimen/activity_horizontal_margin"
    android:paddingRight="@dimen/activity_horizontal_margin"
    android:paddingLeft="@dimen/activity_horizontal_margin" >

    <ImageView
        android:id="@+id/cardsui_error_placeholder_icon"
        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:padding="16dp"
        android:src="@drawable/ic_launcher" />

    <LinearLayout
    	android:layout_width="0dp"
    	android:layout_height="match_parent"
    	android:padding="8dp">
    	
    	<TextView
        android:id="@+id/cardsui_error_placeholder_title"
        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:layout_gravity="center_horizontal"
        android:text="Large Text"
        android:textAppearance="?android:attr/textAppearanceLarge"
        android:textColor="@android:color/holo_orange_dark" />

    	<TextView
        android:id="@+id/cardsui_error_placeholder_msg"
        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:layout_gravity="center_horizontal"
        android:text="Medium Text"
        android:textAppearance="?android:attr/textAppearanceMedium" />	
    </LinearLayout>

</LinearLayout>

    android:orientation="vertical"
    android:paddingBottom="16dp" >

    <LinearLayout
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:gravity="center_vertical"
        android:paddingLeft="8dp"
        android:paddingRight="8dp" >

        <TextView
            android:id="@+id/card_basic_title"
            style="@style/CardTitle"
            android:layout_width="0dp"
            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
            android:layout_weight="1"
            android:text="title" />
    </LinearLayout>

        android:layout_width="fill_parent"
        android:layout_height="1dp"
        android:layout_marginTop="4dp"
        android:background="@color/stroke" />

    <LinearLayout
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:background="@drawable/selectable_background_cardbank"
        android:gravity="center_vertical"
        android:padding="4dp" >

        <TextView
            android:id="@+id/card_basic_text"
            style="@style/CardText"
            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
            android:layout_marginLeft="8dp"
            android:ellipsize="end"
            android:maxLines="4"
            android:text="Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Donec viverra metus et ligula accumsan auctor. Nullam luctus neque quis nibh porttitor sagittis. Nunc dignissim quam nec quam scelerisque faucibus. Maecenas elementum ante eget felis vestibulum quis pharetra dui condimentum. In a ligula lectus, aliquet interdum diam. Fusce luctus bibendum tellus, sed iaculis mi vehicula vitae. Fusce quis ipsum in est ultricies egestas a vel orci." />
    </LinearLayout>

</LinearLayout>

res/layout/card_picture.xml

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
    android:orientation="vertical" >

    <LinearLayout
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:gravity="center_vertical"
        android:paddingLeft="8dp"
        android:paddingRight="8dp" >

        <TextView
            android:id="@+id/card_picture_title"
            style="@style/CardTitle"
            android:layout_width="0dp"
            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
            android:layout_weight="1"
            android:text="title" />
    </LinearLayout>

    <View
        android:layout_width="fill_parent"
        android:layout_height="1dp"
        android:layout_marginTop="4dp"
        android:background="@color/stroke" />

    <LinearLayout
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:background="@drawable/selectable_background_cardbank"
        android:gravity="center_vertical"
        android:padding="8dp" >

        <ImageView
            android:id="@+id/card_picture_image"
            android:layout_width="154dp"
            android:layout_height="127dp"
            android:adjustViewBounds="true"
            android:baselineAlignBottom="true"
            android:scaleType="centerCrop" />

        <TextView
            android:id="@+id/card_picture_text"
            style="@style/CardText"
            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
            android:layout_height="match_parent"
            android:layout_marginLeft="8dp"
            android:ellipsize="end"
            android:maxLines="7"
            android:text="Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Donec viverra metus et ligula accumsan auctor. Nullam luctus neque quis nibh porttitor sagittis. Nunc dignissim quam nec quam scelerisque faucibus. Maecenas elementum ante eget felis vestibulum quis pharetra dui condimentum. In a ligula lectus, aliquet interdum diam. Fusce luctus bibendum tellus, sed iaculis mi vehicula vitae. Fusce quis ipsum in est ultricies egestas a vel orci." />
    </LinearLayout>

</LinearLayout>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
    android:orientation="vertical" >

    <LinearLayout
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:gravity="center_vertical"
        android:paddingLeft="8dp"
        android:paddingRight="8dp" >

        <TextView
            android:id="@+id/card_picture_title"
            style="@style/CardTitle"
            android:layout_width="0dp"
            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
            android:layout_weight="1"
            android:text="title" />
    </LinearLayout>

    <View
        android:layout_width="fill_parent"
        android:layout_height="1dp"
        android:layout_marginTop="4dp"
        android:background="@color/stroke" />

    <LinearLayout
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:background="@drawable/selectable_background_cardbank"
        android:gravity="center_vertical"
        android:orientation="vertical"
        android:padding="8dp" >

        <ImageView
            android:id="@+id/card_picture_image"
            android:layout_width="match_parent"
            android:layout_height="127dp"
            android:adjustViewBounds="true"
            android:baselineAlignBottom="true"
            android:scaleType="centerCrop" />

        <LinearLayout
            style="@style/button_bar"
            android:layout_width="match_parent"
            android:layout_height="match_parent"
            android:divider="@drawable/divider_vertical"
            android:orientation="horizontal"
            android:showDividers="middle" >

            <Button
                android:id="@+id/card_picture_large_button_left"
                style="@style/button_bar_button"
                android:layout_width="0dp"
                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                android:layout_weight="1"
                android:drawableLeft="@drawable/action_search"
                android:text="View data" />

            <Button
                android:id="@+id/card_picture_large_button_right"
                style="@style/button_bar_button"
                android:layout_width="0dp"
                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                android:layout_weight="1"
                android:drawableLeft="@drawable/icon_chart_blue"
                android:text="Interactive" />
        </LinearLayout>
    </LinearLayout>

</LinearLayout>

    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="match_parent"
    android:paddingLeft="@dimen/activity_horizontal_margin"
    android:paddingRight="@dimen/activity_horizontal_margin"

        android:layout_height="wrap_content"

        android:layout_marginBottom="16dp"/>

res/layout/navdrawer.xml

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    android:id="@+id/navdrawer_layout"
    android:layout_width="@dimen/nav_drawer_width"
    android:layout_height="match_parent"
    android:layout_gravity="start"
    android:background="@android:color/background_light"
    android:orientation="vertical" >

    <RelativeLayout
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content" >

        <ImageView
            android:id="@+id/cardsui_error_placeholder_icon"
            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
            android:layout_alignParentLeft="true"
            android:layout_alignParentTop="true"
            android:layout_marginLeft="16dp"
            android:layout_marginTop="16dp"
            android:contentDescription="@string/a11y_cd_areabase_icon"
            android:src="@drawable/ic_launcher" />

        <TextView
            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
            android:layout_alignTop="@+id/cardsui_error_placeholder_icon"
            android:layout_toRightOf="@+id/cardsui_error_placeholder_icon"
            android:focusable="false"
            android:text="@string/app_name"
            android:textAppearance="?android:attr/textAppearanceLarge" />

        <TextView
            android:id="@+id/navdrawer_link_areabaseHelp"
            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
            android:layout_alignBottom="@+id/cardsui_error_placeholder_icon"
            android:layout_alignParentRight="true"
            android:layout_marginRight="16dp"
            android:background="@drawable/selectable_background_cardbank"
            android:clickable="true"
            android:focusable="true"
            android:text="@string/action_help"
            android:textColor="@color/holoLightBlueColour" />

        <View
            android:layout_width="match_parent"
            android:layout_height="1dp"
            android:layout_alignParentLeft="true"
            android:layout_below="@+id/cardsui_error_placeholder_icon"
            android:layout_marginTop="16dp"
            android:background="@drawable/divider_horizontal_holo_dark" />
    </RelativeLayout>

    <lamparski.areabase.widgets.RobotoLightTextView
        android:id="@+id/navdrawer_link_areabaseSummary"
        style="@style/areabaseNavDrawerLink"
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:background="@drawable/selectable_background_links"
        android:drawableLeft="@drawable/nav_summary_padded"
        android:text="@string/caption_summary" />

    <View
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="1dp"

    <View

        android:layout_height="1dp"

    <lamparski.areabase.widgets.RobotoLightTextView
        android:id="@+id/navdrawer_link_areabaseEconomy"
        style="@style/areabaseNavDrawerLink"
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"

        android:text="@string/caption_economy" />

    <View

        android:layout_height="1dp"
        android:background="@drawable/divider_horizontal_holo_dark" />

    <lamparski.areabase.widgets.RobotoLightTextView
        android:id="@+id/navdrawer_link_areabaseEnvironment"

        android:layout_width="match_parent"

    <View
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="1dp"
        android:layout_marginBottom="@dimen/nav_drawer_catsep_height"
        android:background="@drawable/divider_horizontal_holo_dark" />

    <lamparski.areabase.widgets.RobotoLightTextView
        android:id="@+id/navdrawer_link_areabaseONSBrowser"
        style="@style/areabaseNavDrawerLink"
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:background="@drawable/selectable_background_links"
        android:drawableLeft="@drawable/nav_ons_padded"
        android:text="@string/caption_ONS" />

    <View
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="1dp"
        android:background="@drawable/divider_horizontal_holo_dark" />

    <lamparski.areabase.widgets.RobotoLightTextView
        android:id="@+id/navdrawer_link_areabasePoliceDataBrowser"
        style="@style/areabaseNavDrawerLink"
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:background="@drawable/selectable_background_links"
        android:drawableLeft="@drawable/navicon_police"
        android:text="@string/caption_Police" />

    <View
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="1dp"
        android:background="@drawable/divider_horizontal_holo_dark" />

</LinearLayout>

res/layout-land/fragment_graphactivity.xml

<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="match_parent"
    android:orientation="vertical"
    tools:context=".GraphActivity">

    <TabHost
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:id="@+id/graph_activity_tabhost"
        android:layout_gravity="center_horizontal">

        <LinearLayout
            android:layout_width="fill_parent"
            android:layout_height="fill_parent"
            android:orientation="vertical">

            <LinearLayout
                android:layout_width="match_parent"
                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
                android:orientation="horizontal">
                <LinearLayout
                    android:layout_width="wrap_content"
                    android:layout_height="match_parent"
                    android:orientation="vertical">
                    <TextView
                        android:id="@+id/subject_view_header"
                        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
                        android:layout_height="0dp"
                        android:text="SUBJECT NAME"
                        android:fontFamily="sans-serif-condensed"
                        style="@android:style/TextAppearance.Holo.SearchResult.Title"
                        android:layout_marginLeft="8dp"
                        android:layout_gravity="center_vertical"
                        android:textAlignment="gravity"
                        android:layout_marginRight="16dp"
                        android:gravity="center_vertical"
                        android:layout_weight="1" />
                    <View
                        android:layout_width="match_parent"
                        android:layout_height="1dp"
                        android:background="@android:color/holo_blue_dark"
                        android:layout_gravity="bottom" />
                    </LinearLayout>
                <TabWidget
                    android:id="@android:id/tabs"
                    android:layout_width="0dp"
                    android:layout_weight="1"
                    android:layout_height="wrap_content">
                </TabWidget>
                </LinearLayout>

            <FrameLayout
                android:id="@android:id/tabcontent"
                android:layout_width="fill_parent"
                android:layout_height="fill_parent">

                <LinearLayout
                    android:id="@+id/graph_activity_tab1"
                    android:layout_width="fill_parent"
                    android:layout_height="fill_parent">
                    <com.echo.holographlibrary.BarGraph
                        android:layout_width="match_parent"
                        android:layout_height="match_parent"
                        android:id="@id/graph_activity_bargraph"/>
                </LinearLayout>

                <LinearLayout
                    android:id="@+id/graph_activity_tab2"
                    android:layout_width="fill_parent"
                    android:layout_height="fill_parent">
                    <ListView
                        android:layout_width="match_parent"
                        android:layout_height="match_parent"
                        android:id="@id/graph_activity_legend_list"/>
                </LinearLayout>
            </FrameLayout>
        </LinearLayout>
    </TabHost>


</LinearLayout>

res/menu/areabase_opts_menu.xml

<menu xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" >

    <item
        android:id="@+id/action_settings"
        android:orderInCategory="100"
        android:showAsAction="never"
        android:title="@string/action_settings"/>
    <item
        android:id="@+id/action_locate"
        android:icon="@drawable/location_place"
        android:orderInCategory="1"
        android:showAsAction="always|withText|collapseActionView"
        android:title="@string/action_locate">
    </item>
    <item
        android:id="@+id/action_search"
        android:actionLayout="@layout/action_search_edittext"
        android:icon="@drawable/action_search"
        android:orderInCategory="2"
        android:showAsAction="always|collapseActionView"
        android:title="@string/action_search">
    </item>
    <item
        android:id="@+id/action_refresh"
        android:icon="@drawable/navigation_refresh"
        android:orderInCategory="3"
        android:showAsAction="ifRoom"
        android:title="@string/action_refresh">
    </item>
    <item
        android:id="@+id/action_help"
        android:icon="@drawable/action_help"
        android:orderInCategory="101"
        android:showAsAction="never"
        android:title="@string/action_help">
    </item>

</menu>

res/values/color.xml

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<resources>

    <color name="holoLightBlueColour">#FF33B5E5</color>

    <drawable name="holoLightBlueDrawable">#FF33B5E5</drawable>

    <color name="stroke">#FFCCCCCC</color>

    <!-- Colour for areas whose score >= 80 -->
    <color name="arearank80">@android:color/holo_blue_dark</color>
    <!-- Colour for areas whose score >= 60 -->
    <color name="arearank60">@android:color/holo_green_dark</color>
    <!-- Colour for areas whose score >= 40 -->
    <color name="arearank40">@android:color/holo_orange_dark</color>
    <!-- Colour for areas whose score < 21 -->
    <color name="arearank20">@android:color/holo_red_dark</color>

</resources>

res/values/data.xml

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<resources>

    <item name="pop_density" format="float" type="fraction">256.0</item>

</resources>

res/values/dimens.xml

<resources>

    <!-- Default screen margins, per the Android Design guidelines. -->
    <dimen name="activity_horizontal_margin">16dp</dimen>
    <dimen name="activity_vertical_margin">16dp</dimen>
    <dimen name="nav_drawer_catsep_height">24dp</dimen>
    <dimen name="nav_drawer_width">300dp</dimen>
    <dimen name="chart_view_height">180dp</dimen>

</resources>

res/values/strings.xml

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<resources>

    <!-- app -->
    <string name="app_name">Areabase</string>

    <!-- actions -->
    <string name="action_settings">Settings</string>
    <string name="action_locate">Locate</string>
    <string name="action_search">Search</string>
    <string name="action_refresh">Refresh</string>
    <string name="action_help">Help</string>
    <string name="action_search_hint">Postcode or area name</string>
    <string name="action_graph">Graph this data</string>
    <string name="action_graph_explanation">Open a new window to view a graph of this dataset.</string>
    <string name="select_area_from_list">Select area name</string>

    <!-- messages -->
    <string name="toast_mapview_not_loading">Could not load the map view.</string>
    <string name="error_illegal_url_title">Something is trying to open in the map area.</string>
    <string name="error_illegal_url_formatstring">This should not happen. If you think this is not a problem, here is the url: %1$s</string>
    <string name="error_illegal_url_response_dontgo">Stay in Areabase</string>
    <string name="error_illegal_url_response_open">Open in browser (caution)</string>
    <string name="drawer_open">Open drawer</string>
    <string name="drawer_close">Close drawer</string>
    <string name="error_cannot_fetch_area_data">Sorry, data about this area could not be fetched.</string>
    <string name="error_cannot_fetch_area_data_body">Please make sure you are connected to the Internet and try again later. The message associated with this error is: %1$s. Hope this helps.</string>
    <string name="io_exception_generic_message">Please check your connection.</string>
    <string name="summaryactivity_cardmaker_ioerror_body">Ensure that you have some form of connectivity enabled. If you are using an authenticated proxy, Areabase will not work.</string>
    <string name="summaryactivity_cardmaker_onserror">Error processing ONS data. Sorry :(</string>
    <string name="summaryactivity_cardmaker_servicedisconnect_title">Oh noes!</string>
    <string name="summaryactivity_cardmaker_servicedisconnect_message">An important component of Areabase, %1$s, just broke. The app will probably crash and burn soon. Sorry :(</string>
    <string name="summaryactivity_cardmaker_values_not_available">Areabase may not work correctly in certain areas, mostly Scotland and Northern Ireland. Office for National Statistics does not cover Scotland and NI, and Scottish National Statistics does not provide a way Areabase can access its data. Police data is not available for Northern Ireland. Lastly, datasets may not be complete in any of these databases.</string>
    <string name="error_cannot_resolve_postcode">Could not resolve the postcode.</string>
    <string name="error_cannot_resolve_postcode_body">The postcode for your location appears invalid. This could be because of how Google Geocoder returns postcodes. Try to walk to a different location and press the "Locate" button.</string>
    <string name="file_not_found_msg">Some data could not be found.</string>
    <string name="areas_not_found">There are no matching Local Authorities.</string>

    <!-- navigation -->
    <string name="navdrawer_secheader_basic_info">This area</string>
    <string name="caption_summary">Summary</string>
    <string name="caption_crime">Crime</string>
    <string name="caption_economy">Economy</string>
    <string name="caption_environment">Environment</string>
    <string name="navdrawer_secheader_more_data">Explore data</string>
    <string name="caption_ONS">Office for National Statistics</string>
    <string name="caption_Police">Police.uk</string>
    <string name="navdrawer_secheader_misc">Miscellaneous</string>
    <string name="caption_area_hierarchy">Hierarchy</string>
    <string name="caption_area_compare">Compare areas</string>

    <!-- preferences -->
    <string name="title_activity_settings">Preferences</string>
    <!-- preferences -> location -->
    <string name="pref_category_location_heading">Location</string>
    <string name="pref_category_location_autoLocate_primaryText">Automatically find location</string>
    <string name="pref_category_location_autoLocate_infoText_enabled">Areabase will automatically find your location on startup.</string>
    <string name="pref_category_location_autoLocate_infoText_disabled">Areabase will wait until you press "Locate" to find your location.</string>
    <string name="pref_category_location_backgroundRefix_primaryText">Update location in the background</string>
    <string name="pref_category_location_backgroundRefix_infoText_enabled">Areabase will keep your location up-to-date by querying GPS periodically.</string>
    <string name="pref_category_location_backgroundRefix_infoText_disabled">Areabase will not keep track of your location. This may save battery, but "Locate" may take longer.</string>
    <!-- preferences -> testing -->
    <string name="pref_category_testing_heading">Experimental</string>
    <string name="pref_category_testing_phoneHome_primaryText">Report crashes</string>
    <string name="pref_category_testing_phoneHome_infoText_enabled">If the application crashes, an automatic report will be sent to the developer.</string>
    <string name="pref_category_testing_phoneHome_infoText_disabled">Areabase will not send anything to the developer. You want to turn this on though.</string>

    <!-- cards -->
    <!-- cards -> demographics -->
    <string name="card_demographics_title">People of %1$s</string>
    <string name="card_demographics_title_base">%1$s is a demographically %2$s area.</string>

    <string-array name="card_demographics_pop_size_trend_descriptors">
        <item>collapsing</item>
        <item>declining</item>
        <item>stable</item>
        <item>growing</item>
        <item>booming</item>
    </string-array>

    <string name="card_demographics_body_base">There is %1$s and average age is %2$.1f. The area is %3$s.</string>

    <string-array name="card_demographics_sex_dominance_descriptors">
        <item>significantly more women</item>
        <item>more women</item>
        <item>gender balance</item>
        <item>more men</item>
        <item>significantly more men</item>
    </string-array>
    <string-array name="card_demographics_pop_density_descriptors">
        <item>very sparsely populated</item>
        <item>sparsely populated</item>
        <item>normally populated</item>
        <item>densely populated</item>
        <item>very densely populated</item>
    </string-array>

    <!-- cards -> economy -->
    <string name="card_economy_title">Economy of %1$s</string>
    <string name="card_economy_body_base">Most of people in %1$s are %2$s. Most people here work in %3$s. Unemployment is at %4$.1f%% and %5$s.</string>

    <string-array name="card_economy_unemployment_trend">
        <item>sharply falling</item>
        <item>falling</item>
        <item>stable</item>
        <item>rising</item>
        <item>sharply rising</item>
    </string-array>

    <!-- cards -> crime (real, ie via police data) -->
    <string name="card_crime_real_title">Crime in %1$s</string>
    <string name="card_crime_real_body_base">The most commonly reported type of crime here is %1$s. Crime overall is %2$s.</string>

    <string-array name="card_crime_real_trend">
        <item>sharply falling</item>
        <item>falling</item>
        <item>stable</item>
        <item>rising</item>
        <item>sharply rising</item>
    </string-array>

    <string name="card_environ_title">Environment in %1$s</string>
    <string name="card_environ_body_base">%1$s is %2$s area. Energy use as of %3$s was %4$.1f MWh, and it is %5$s.</string>

    <string-array name="card_environ_area_types">
        <item>a rural</item>
        <item>an urban</item>
        <item>an highly urban</item>
    </string-array>
    <string-array name="card_environ_energy_trend">
        <item>quickly decreasing</item>
        <item>decreasing</item>
        <item>not changing</item>
        <item>increasing</item>
        <item>quickly increasing</item>
    </string-array>

    <!-- cards -> score -->
    <string name="card_arearank_text">AreaRank for %1$s</string>

    <string name="card_error_values_not_available_title">Some data for this area is not available.</string>
    <string name="card_error_values_not_available_body">Some areas may be missing data in the ONS database; Scotland and Northern Ireland are not supported.</string>
    <string name="a11y_cd_areabase_icon">The Areabase icon</string>
    <string name="error_police_api">Could not fetch crime data</string>
    <string name="error_police_api_body">Please try again later. The following might be helpful: %1$s</string>

    <string name="title_activity_graph">Graph View</string>

    <string name="tab_graph">Graph</string>
    <string name="tab_legend">Legend</string>

</resources>

res/values/styles.xml

<resources xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android">

    <!--
        Base application theme, dependent on API level. This theme is replaced
        by AppBaseTheme from res/values-vXX/styles.xml on newer devices.
    -->
    <style name="AppBaseTheme" parent="android:Theme.Light">
        <!--
            Theme customizations available in newer API levels can go in
            res/values-vXX/styles.xml, while customizations related to
            backward-compatibility can go here.
        -->
    </style>

    <!-- Application theme. -->
    <style name="AppTheme" parent="AppBaseTheme">
        <!-- All customizations that are NOT specific to a particular API-level can go here. -->
    </style>

    <drawable name="myTransparentDrawable">#0000</drawable>
    <drawable name="mySemiTransparentDrawable">#dfff</drawable>

    <style name="areabaseNavDrawerLink">
        <item name="android:typeface">sans</item>
        <item name="android:drawablePadding">8dp</item>
        <item name="android:textSize">24sp</item>
        <item name="android:gravity">center_vertical</item>
        <item name="android:textStyle">normal</item>
        <item name="android:textColor">@android:color/primary_text_light</item>
    </style>

    <style name="button_bar_button" parent="@android:style/Widget.Holo.Light.Button.Borderless.Small"></style>

    <style name="button_bar" parent="@android:style/Holo.Light.ButtonBar"></style>

</resources>

    <dimen name="chart_view_height">320dp</dimen>

res/values-v14/styles.xml

<resources xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android">

    <!--
        Base application theme for API 14+. This theme completely replaces
        AppBaseTheme from BOTH res/values/styles.xml and
        res/values-v11/styles.xml on API 14+ devices.
    -->
    <style name="AppBaseTheme" parent="android:Theme.Holo.Light">
        <!-- API 14 theme customizations can go here. -->
    </style>

    <style name="ButtonBarButton" parent="@android:style/Widget.Holo.Light.Button.Borderless.Small"></style>

    <style name="ButtonBar" parent="@android:style/Holo.Light.ButtonBar"></style>

</resources>

res/values-w820dp/dimens.xml

<resources>
    <!-- Example customization of dimensions originally defined in res/values/dimens.xml
         (such as screen margins) for screens with more than 820dp of available width. This
         would include 7" and 10" devices in landscape (~960dp and ~1280dp respectively). -->
    <dimen name="activity_horizontal_margin">64dp</dimen>
</resources>

res/xml/preferences.xml

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<PreferenceScreen xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" >

    <PreferenceCategory
        android:key="pref_category_location"
        android:title="@string/pref_category_location_heading" >
        <CheckBoxPreference
            android:key="pref_location_autolocate"
            android:summaryOff="@string/pref_category_location_autoLocate_infoText_disabled"
            android:summaryOn="@string/pref_category_location_autoLocate_infoText_enabled"
            android:title="@string/pref_category_location_autoLocate_primaryText" />
        <CheckBoxPreference
            android:key="pref_location_backgroundlocate"
            android:summaryOff="@string/pref_category_location_backgroundRefix_infoText_disabled"
            android:summaryOn="@string/pref_category_location_backgroundRefix_infoText_enabled"
            android:title="@string/pref_category_location_backgroundRefix_primaryText" />
    </PreferenceCategory>

    <PreferenceCategory
        android:key="pref_category_storage"
        android:title="Storage">

        <Preference
            android:key="pref_storage_remove_old_data"
            android:title="Clear old data" />

        <Preference
            android:key="pref_storage_reset_scores"
            android:title="Reset AreaRank scores"
            android:summary="This will reset all scores. Computing them again may take time."/>

        </PreferenceCategory>

    <PreferenceCategory
        android:key="pref_category_testing"
        android:title="@string/pref_category_testing_heading" >
        <CheckBoxPreference
            android:key="pref_testing_phonehome"
            android:summaryOff="@string/pref_category_testing_phoneHome_infoText_disabled"
            android:summaryOn="@string/pref_category_testing_phoneHome_infoText_enabled"
            android:title="@string/pref_category_testing_phoneHome_primaryText" />
    </PreferenceCategory>

</PreferenceScreen>
